#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<limits.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
int arr[200001];
ll dp[200001];
int main(){
	int n, temp , temp2;
	cin >> n;
	for(int i = 1 ; i<= n ; i++){
		scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
		dp[i] = INT_MAX;	
	}
	dp[1] = 0;
	for(int i = 2 ; i<= n ; i++){
		temp = 0;
		while(1){
			temp2 =  i - pow(2,temp);
			if(temp2 < 1)
				break;
			dp[i] = min(dp[i],dp[temp2] + (ll)abs(double(arr[i] - arr[temp2])));
			temp ++ ;
		}
	}
	cout << dp[n] << endl;
}
